2026-01-07.content: On January 7, 2026, we released an updated version of Apigee.

summary.title: Apigee Updated
summary.summary: An updated version of Apigee was released on January 7, 2026. This release includes new features and improvements.

2026-01-07.content:
| Bug ID | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **471150886, 471150271, 471150102, 426783172** | **Security fixes for the Apigee Operator for Kubernetes.** This addresses the following vulnerabilities:   * [CVE-2025-55163](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-55163) * [CVE-2025-67735](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-67735) * [CVE-2025-58057](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-58057) * [CVE-2025-58056](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-58056) |

summary.title: Apigee Operator Security Updates
summary.summary: Security fixes are now available for the Apigee Operator for Kubernetes, addressing multiple critical vulnerabilities including CVE-2025-55163, CVE-2025-67735, CVE-2025-58057, and CVE-2025-58056. Applying these updates is recommended to protect your environment.

2026-01-07.content: **The Apigee Operator for Kubernetes version 1.1.1 is now available.**

summary.title: Apigee Operator 1.1.1 Released
summary.summary: The Apigee Operator for Kubernetes version 1.1.1 has been released. This update is now available for all users.
